channel.title: The Master Sword! [1st Model] PLEASE LOOK
channel.description: Hello guys I just started modeling with meta so just tell me what I need to impore on this is only version one of the famous zelda master sword [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/masterswordv1.png[/img] the wings arent as good as I interpreted as you can see my refrence one had somehing like wrinckles ad Thats what im working on for my seccond one :D [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/masterswordv1n2.png[/img] Theres a full thing :D [img]http://i347.photobucket.com/albums/p460/frogtamer101/The_Master_Sword_by_retroWeapon.jpg[/img] And theres my reference, I know the golden things near the top arent there and I REALLLY wan to add those so I hope it works. I thought it was pretty good for my first model lol. But please dont go easy on me cause I want my v2 to be the best I can get it.
